Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary of Egypt:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te ]ack/thc ]cwtp m~m/i: ]a~gia Maria n~rem n~,/mi: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the ascetic, the truly chosen St. Mary of Egypt, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
